item.title: Behind Saquon Barkley's dip in production after career year: Can the Eagles fix it?
item.description: A drastic turnaround for Barkley might feel far-fetched, but notable improvement in the run game is attainable.

item.title: The art of drawing flags: Which QBs get the most? Should Justin Herbert argue more?
item.description: We spoke to past and present quarterbacks about whether arguing with officials helped them.

item.title: What do Week 14 games mean for the rest of the season? We hit big questions, key stats and QB breakouts
item.description: Our NFL Nation reporters answer big questions from each Week 14 game.

item.title: Let's overreact to NFL Week 14: Wait, are the Bills still in the AFC East hunt?
item.description: Did Josh Allen put Buffalo in position to win its division again? We overreact to Week 14, plus fantasy takes.

item.title: Sources: Colts lose QB Jones to torn Achilles
item.description: Colts quarterback Daniel Jones suffered a season-ending torn Achilles in the first quarter of Sunday's loss to the Jaguars.
